    • Method Detail

      • getLastWSLocation

        public static java.lang.String getLastWSLocation()
        Returns:
        the last workspace location or null

      • checkWorkspaceDirectory

        public static java.lang.String checkWorkspaceDirectory(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell parentShell,
                                                       java.lang.String workspaceLocation,
                                                       boolean askCreate)
        Ensures a workspace directory is OK in regards of reading/writing, etc. This method will get called externally as well.
        Parameters:
        parentShell - Shell parent shell
        workspaceLocation - Directory the user wants to use
        askCreate - Whether to ask if to create the workspace in this location or not if it does not exist already
        Returns:
        null if everything is ok, or an error message if not

      • initializeWS

        public static void initializeWS()
        method to reset the 'remember workspace' preferences after initializing a workspace

      • initiateWorkspace

        public static void initiateWorkspace()
        if true the workspace has to be initialized, for that purpose it is neccesary to restart the Platform

      • getLastUsedWorkspace

        public static java.lang.String getLastUsedWorkspace()
        Returns:
        the Last used Workspace Location or null no recent workspace is available

      • shouldRememberWS

        public static boolean shouldRememberWS()
        Returns:
        whether application should remember the ws or not, false if no choice is recognised

      • shouldRememberWS

        public static boolean shouldRememberWS(boolean check)
        Parameters:
        check - if the function should check the workspace instead of just returning the preference
        Returns:
        whether application should remember the ws or not, false if no choice is recognised
